## Too easy?

### a) Loading
Load the dataset. You might use

```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
set.seed(1)
df <- data.frame(
  x = seq(20, 60, length.out = 100),
  y = 100 + 1.1 * seq(20, 60, length.out = 100) + rnorm(100, sd = 5)
)
```

### b) Average age
Calculate the average age of the participants.

```{r, echo=params$lsg, eval=params$lsg}
mean(df$x)
```
